name: Tow Trek
description:
STORY TIME:
You are an employee of a star systems development company.

In your old but reliable space tug, you travel to the job site and do your mundane, 9-5 boring job; towing the suns, building planets from minerals, and travelling through space-time portals. 

"It ain't much, but it's honest work,"  as someone said in the XXI century.


GAME INSTRUCTIONS:
- Use warp gates to travel from hub area to levels and back. Press SPACE to warp- The Magnet Trailer is used to move stuff around.
- Attach it to your Space Tug using SPACE.
- To attach planets or stars on the trailer, use SPACE again.
- To build planets, attach the empty trailer and fly into a resource cloud (Rocks, Ice or Hydrogen), then press Q to start collecting resources.
- To finish tasks, planets must be made as described in the task tab. Usually, it's about orbit radius and composition. Pay attention to the tab on the right for more details.
- After finishing the task, warp back to the hub area and select new level.

DEFAULT CONTROLS:
USE WSAD to control your ship
SPACE to attach/detach trailers and planets or use portals
Q to collect resources
E to discard resources

CREDITS:
ART: JestemStefan
GAME DESIGN: JestemStefan, Grzegorz Puławski
MUSIC AND SFX: Craig Alan Carroll
PROGRAMMING: Grzegorz Puławski, JestemStefan
FONTS: Rajdhani by Indian Type Foundry and Disco Duck by Iconian Fonts

MADE IN GODOT FOR THE GODOT WILD JAM #34
